name: AIA - Maxime Jublou
prompt: You are the Personal AI Assistant of Maxime Jublou, tailored to help Maxime. Like JARVIS and Tony Stark in Iron man, you help Maxime build is personal brand and be efficient and authentic in its daily tasks. Be fun and sharp. Always ground your responses to Maxime's ontology, and explain your reasoning.

    color: '#0A66C2'
    group: LinkedIn.ProfileView
  summary: "> Believing in you is allowing yourself to have an impact on the world.\n\nPassionate
    about DevOps and Cloud. I love to give super powers to technical teams and allow
    companies to easily and safely go from idea to production.\n\nTopics I work the
    most on:\n- Migration from anywhere to AWS.\n- Adoption of AWS best practices.\n-
    Kubernetes.\n- CI/CD and Gitflow setup.\n- Education / Knowledge transfer\n\nAll
    of the above include Terraform code \U0001F680"
- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: "\U0001F680 CashStory is an automation services company.\n\nWe developed
    a framework to help professionals approach data, automation & AI through Education
    and Opensource products.\nWe train motivated individuals on how to take back control
    over their data and build an infinite solution maker mindset. \U0001F44C\n\nWe
    believe in a better way to see financial & extra-financial information for wiser
    decision making, taking into consideration environmental issues & well being as
    much as cash, profit and value. \U0001F30D\n\nWe are empowering contributors,
    partners and colleagues to help them have a huge impact through opensource contributions.\n\nCurrently
    building :\n- Naas.ai : Jupyter notebooks as a service for tech savvy users.\n-
    CS Education : a gamified training program in French to develop data mining &
    soft skills.\n- BOB : opensource enterprise search & workspaces by projects. (R&D)"
  id: abi:ActofWorking#MaximeJ%7CChiefTechnologyOfficer%7CCashStory
  name: Maxime J | Chief Technology Officer | CashStory

- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: 'Working remotely for US-based clients.


    Stack:

    - AWS (EC2, VPC, Lambda, CloudWatch, S3, ECS, Cloudformation API Gateway, IAM,
    SQS, etc ...)

    - Terraform / Terragrunt

    - Kubernetes (EKS)

    - Packer

    - DataDog

    - PagerDuty

    - Apache Airflow (Deployed on EKS)'
  id: abi:ActofWorking#MaximeJ%7CCloudEngineer/DevOpsConsultant%7CTrackIt
  name: Maxime J | Cloud Engineer / DevOps Consultant | TrackIt
  relations:
  - label: occurs_in
    to: abi:Location#California%2CUnitedStates

    group: LinkedIn.ProfileView
- class: abi:ActofParticipatinginProject
  description: LokiSec is a Security Capture the Flag team. Created in May 2016, our
    team is actually composed of 4 active members. Initially programmers or DevOps,
    we are passionate about the security of information systems. The fundamental principle
    of our team is to share our knowledge in order to solve security challenges. Basically,
    it involves many security areas such as web hacking, binary reverse engineering,
    forensics, cryptography, network, etc. We permanently proceed a technological
    survey and are interested in bug bounty programs. Our goal is to improve our skills
    and learn together to become a reference in the computer security community.

- class: abi:ActofWorking
  description: 'Teaching DevOps modules to students in first, second and third years
    of their bachelor degree.


    One of the best ways for me to contribute and share what I am learning from my
    work with my different clients is to share it directly with students.


    My goal is to help them learn everything needed to be prepared for real-world
    situations through EPITECH projects. The main topics are:

    - Docker

    - CI/CD

    - Kubernetes'
  id: abi:ActofWorking#MaximeJ%7CDevOpsTeacher%7CEPITECH-EuropeanInstituteofTechnology

- class: abi:ActofParticipatinginProject
  description: 'Human Talks is a monthly and totally free national event, we are in
    charge of the organization of the Montpellier one.


    The concept is pretty simple : talks of 10 minutes made by developers for developers.


    The goal is to create a meeting point in order to share our passions and knowledges,
    discover some new technologies and show the dynamism of our city.'

- class: abi:ActofParticipatinginProject
  description: 'This project was my first end to end project.


    The main purpose was to create a website on which a trucking company would be
    able to manage his whole activity.


    Some features:


    - Truck tracking

    - Employee schedule

    - Mission progression

    - Automatic bills generation


    Since the end of my internship, the client has worked with ID2I to add more features
    and SFR has made an article on SFR Business Team.'

  name: Participating in JTMN

- class: abi:ActofParticipatinginProject
  description: 'This project was led by Jean Lejeune as it was his project research.


    In the context of our MSc in Computer / Network Security at the University of
    Kent, we were commissioned to pentest the European Organization for Nuclear Research.
    To perform this operation, we scheduled two main phases : the recon and the poking
    deep. Our objectives were to assess the CERN information system in order to highlight
    flaws and breaches within their infrastructure.'
